org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.AbstractLdapService
      org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BasicLdapService, LdapEntityService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl
public class SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl
extends AbstractLdapService
implements LdapEntityService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

An implementation of LdapEntityService based on LdapTemplate. See /properties/ldap/ldap-example.xml.

See Also:
